title: Two Sum
description:
Given an array of integers nums and a target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target.
Example:
Input: nums = [2,7,11,15], target = 9
Output: [0,1]
constraints: 2 <= nums.length <= 10^5; -10^9 <= nums[i] <= 10^9; -10^9 <= target <= 10^9; exactly one valid answer exists.

title: Reverse String
description:
Write a function that reverses a string.
Example:
Input: hello
Output: olleh
constraints: 1 <= s.length <= 10^5; s consists of printable ASCII characters; do the reversal in-place if possible.

title: Valid Parentheses
description: Given a string containing '(', ')', '{', '}', '[' and ']', determine if the input string is valid.
constraints: 1 <= s.length <= 10^4; s only contains '(', ')', '{', '}', '[' and ']'; stack-based O(n) time and O(n) space expected.
